about_the_game:
"Melo's Cat Cafe" is the perfect game for players who want to relax in a stress-free environment.
Instead of chasing goals, players can simply enjoy spending time with the cats.
Observe the cats as they eat and sleep, and find peace of mind in their calm presence.

Main Features

Spacious Mountain Home
The game is set in a large house on top of a mountain with beautiful scenic views.
　　The view from the terrace is breathtaking.

Free-Spirited Cats
Free-spirited and independent cats make an appearance.
　　When you click on them to pet them, they respond with a meow.
　　Observe their behaviors and be charmed by their cuteness.

Relaxing Activities
Players have the freedom to act as they please,
　　without specific goals or restrictions.
　　A simple timer is provided which can be used to set work periods or serve as a break alarm.

Interactive Environment
The house and garden are filled with macaron toys for the cats to play with.
　　They might seem like they’re just being pushed around and played with, though.

Chroma key compositing
this app can also use a magenta-based chroma key compositing mode.

　Music used
　　The BGM used is a song published on "FREE BGM DOVA-SYNDROME", so you can use it with confidence even for monetized live performances.
